short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In honor of Women's History month, join us in celebrating women with a signature that honors female voices. Including yours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verizon invites you to add this email signature in celebration of women whose voices and achievements changed the course of history. From scientists to social change pioneers, their legacies will now become part of your email signature. Inspiring both sender and receiver–and reminding women of the power of their own voice–one email at a time.
